Complaint against vandalism performed by Nestle delivery staff in HK

I am writing to your company to complain against issue which was happened in HK on 16.7.2019.

Background
Since June 2019, Hong Kong has been protesting against the extradition bill, which could result in Hongkongers being sent to mainland China for trial with whatever reason or excuses claimed by the Government, if “they” think necessary. In these 2 months, apart from peaceful protests (which resulted in violent incidents and HKers was suffered from HK Police’s excessive violence). “Lennon Walls” were set up elsewhere in Hong Kong to let the citizens to express their opinions regarding the political issue in whatever views. All we done in HK are to ensure a fairer and better political environment for our children, even all we know the One-Country-Two-Systems in HK will come to an end in 2047 and HK will be no more a place of freedom.

Incident
On 16 Jul 2019, One of the “Lennon Wall” in the City was destroyed and taken down by a delivery staff in your company uniform came out from a truck with Nestle livery and advertisement. (Car Registration Number in HK: RA7052). I believe this Truck is under your Nestle Hong Kong, your Hong Kong Distributor.

Observations
I was given to understand that your Company was founded in Switzerland, a peaceful place that respects freedom and human rights. Also, from the information of your global website, one of your ambitions is caring of children and youth. This kind of vandalism behaviour not only constitute damages to someone’s property, but also contradict with your company’s ambition since your staff was trying to ruin the freedom of speech in HK!

In view of above, please could your company look at the matter and provide a reply when practicable.

Thank you for your attention.

寫左封英文信, 槍頭向佢總公司, 英文好既巴打幫手睇睇
